import mock from'../mock';export var searchArr=[{groupTitle:'Pages',searchLimit:4,data:[{id:1,target:'analyticsDash',isBookmarked:false,title:'Bitfari Stats',icon:'Home',link:'/dashboard/analytics'},{id:2,target:'eCommerceDash',isBookmarked:true,title:'Personal Dashboard',icon:'Home',link:'/'},{id:3,target:'email',isBookmarked:false,title:'Tellfari',icon:'Mail',link:'/apps/email'},{id:4,target:'chat',isBookmarked:false,title:'InstaFriend',icon:'MessageSquare',link:'/apps/chat'},{id:5,target:'todo',isBookmarked:true,title:'Life Filter',icon:'CheckSquare',link:'/apps/todo'},{id:6,target:'calendar',isBookmarked:true,title:'Schedule Ads',icon:'Calendar',link:'/apps/calendar'},{id:28,target:'faq',isBookmarked:true,title:'Bitfari FAQ',icon:'Zap',link:'/pages/faq'},{id:29,target:'knowledgeBase',isBookmarked:false,title:'Knowledge Base',icon:'AlignLeft',link:'/pages/knowledge-base'},{id:30,target:'pricing',isBookmarked:true,title:'Pricing',icon:'DollarSign',link:'/pages/pricing'},{id:34,target:'comingSoon',isBookmarked:false,title:'Coming Soon',icon:'Watch',link:'/misc/coming-soon'}]}];// GET Search Data
mock.onGet('/api/main-search/data').reply(function(){return[200,{searchArr:searchArr}];});// GET Search Data & Bookmarks
mock.onGet('/api/bookmarks/data').reply(function(){var bookmarks=searchArr[0].data.filter(function(item){return item.isBookmarked;});var suggestions=searchArr[0].data;return[200,{suggestions:suggestions,bookmarks:bookmarks}];});// POST Update isBookmarked
mock.onPost('/api/bookmarks/update').reply(function(config){var _JSON$parse=JSON.parse(config.data),id=_JSON$parse.id;var obj=searchArr[0].data.find(function(item){return item.id===id;});Object.assign(obj,{isBookmarked:!obj.isBookmarked});return[200];});
